mapper.select: SELECT dprr.id, dcipr.status AS ci_status, dcdpr.status AS cd_status, dprr.creation_date FROM devops_pipeline_record_rel dprr LEFT JOIN devops_ci_pipeline_record dcipr ON dcipr.id = dprr.ci_pipeline_record_id LEFT JOIN devops_cd_pipeline_record dcdpr ON dcdpr.id = dprr.cd_pipeline_record_id WHERE dprr.pipeline_id = #{id} order by dprr.id desc limit 1

select dprr.* from devops_pipeline_record_rel dprr where dprr.pipeline_id = #{pipelineId}
AND dprr.creation_date >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND dprr.creation_date <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')
order by dprr.creation_date DESC

select dprr.* from devops_pipeline_record_rel dprr where 1=1
AND dprr.pipeline_id in
#{pipelineId}
AND dprr.creation_date >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND dprr.creation_date <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')
order by dprr.creation_date DESC
